name: PHASEgo

screenshots.caption: Automatic analysis and plotting of the phase diagram of GaN
Phase diagram of Fe with and without electronic thermal excitation free energy corrections.

short_description: The Phasego package extracts the Helmholtz free energy from the phonon density of states obtained by the first-principles calculations. Then with the help of equation of states fitting, it reduces the Gibbs free energy as a function of pressure/temperature at fixed temperature/pressure. By scanning pressure or temperature axis, it automatically calculates the possible phase boundaries among all the structures provided and finally plotted the phase diagram. For the single phase analysis, Phasego can numerically output many properties, such as the thermal expansion coefficients, the bulk moduli, the heat capacities, the thermal pressures, the Hugoniot pressure-volume-temperature relations, the Gruneisen parameters, and the Debye temperatures.
summary: Automatic calculation and plot of phase diagram
